entry: The following example is for creating a Russian (ru) translation.

entry: 2. Navigate to Steam\steamapps\common\bastion\Content\Game\Text, and make a copy of HelpText.en.xml called HelpText.ru.xml.

entry: 3. Translate the text in HelpText.ru.xml from English to Russian. At the top of the file, make sure the line reads: <HelpText lang="ru">

entry: 5. Copy over the files in Steam\steamapps\common\bastion\Content\Subtitles\e n, and translate them.

entry: Forming relationships on Raptr is now easier than ever. We know it was a bit confusing before as to whether you "friended" someone or "followed" them -- so we_re switching over to a follower system. With this update, the iOS app has been updated to reflect the changes on Raptr.com, which in the simplest terms means that there is no longer a "Friend Requests" menu.
original_text: Forming relationships on Raptr is now easier than ever. We know it was a bit confusing before as to whether you "friended" someone or "followed" them -- so we_re switching over to a follower system. With this update, the iOS app has been updated to reflect the changes on Raptr.com, which in the simplest terms means that there is no longer a "Friend Requests" menu.

entry: Additional technical notes:
original_text: Additional technical notes:

entry: The Desktop application uses the "Chromium Embedded Framework" (CEF), which is a way to include the functionality of a web browser (based on Chrome) in the application - this enables us to develop features in modern programming languages and gives us the possibility to fix issues faster.
original_text: The Desktop application uses the "Chromium Embedded Framework" (CEF), which is a way to include the functionality of a web browser (based on Chrome) in the application - this enables us to develop features in modern programming languages and gives us the possibility to fix issues faster.

entry: This update includes a major upgrade, from CEF1 to CEF3.
original_text: This update includes a major upgrade, from CEF1 to CEF3.

entry: What is worth mentioning though is that this is a major "under the hood" change (techies may be interested in reading more on http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chromium_Embedded_Framework.)
original_text: What is worth mentioning though is that this is a major "under the hood" change (techies may be interested in reading more on http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chromium_Embedded_Framework.)

entry: Also, there's always a risk of unexpected issues with such "big" changes, but we are sure that it's the right thing for us to do - and hopefully our users will understand that they will get a much improved experience thanks to this.
original_text: Also, there's always a risk of unexpected issues with such "big" changes, but we are sure that it's the right thing for us to do - and hopefully our users will understand that they will get a much improved experience thanks to this.
